active.label: Consider Order Complete For Lost Baskets

passcode.label: Passcode
passcode.comment: Recommended: Set a passcode so that basket contents and coupon codes can only be viewed if the following passcode is sent with the request.

setup_data_fields.label: Setup Data Fields
setup_data_fields.comment: This will create data-fields and map them automatically.

suppressed_contacts.label: Update Supressed Contacts
suppressed_contacts.comment: Update All Contacts Who Historically Unsubscribed.

memory_limit.label: Memory Limit
memory_limit.comment: Set to NO to use system default memory.

batch_size.label: Customer Sync Batch Size
batch_size.comment: Set the limit size for customers loaded in memory.

debug_enabled.label: Debug Mode
debug_enabled.comment: Set to YES to allow debug infomation to be saved in var/log directory.
